The '''Big Ball Rasengan''' is a more powerful version of the [[Rasengan]].

== Overview ==
In the anime, [[Naruto]] created the Big Ball Rasengan during his two-and-a-half years of training with [[Jiraiya]]; while training to break out of [[genjutsu]], Naruto accidentally released his chakra and created a huge Rasengan.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 188</ref> It uses the same concept of compressing spinning chakra in one's palm as in the original Rasengan, only increasing the amount of chakra involved. Because there is even more chakra being compressed to a higher density, the ball releases its energy immediately on contact, thus increasing its destructive power beyond the Rasengan's.<ref name="d3" /> In the anime, it is noted that one requires immense amounts of chakra to create a Big Ball Rasengan at all.<ref>''Boruto'' episode 168</ref>

When Naruto first starts using the Big Ball Rasengan, he needs a [[shadow clone]] to help him form and wield it.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 260, page 10</ref> He is able to wield it with one hand when his skill with it improves, though he still needs a clone's help in its formation.<ref name="ch561">''Naruto'' chapter 561, page 13</ref>

== Usage and Improvement ==
Like the original Rasengan, Naruto improved the Big Ball Rasengan and created a [[Spiralling Absorption Sphere|variant]] with his [[Nine-Tails Chakra Mode]]. The size and power of his Big Ball Rasengan also improved, with it growing to nearly half the size of the [[Ultra-Big Ball Rasengan]].<ref name="ch561" /> He can also add [[Wind Release]] to it, to create the [[Big Ball Rasenshuriken]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 655, page 15</ref>

== Senjutsu Influence ==
[[File:Sage Art Big Ball Rasengan.png|thumb|left|Sage Art: Big Ball Rasengan.]]
When in [[Sage Mode]], Naruto can use a [[senjutsu]]-enhanced version known as {{translation|'''Sage Art: Big Ball Rasengan'''|仙法・大玉螺旋丸|Senpō: Ōdama Rasengan|engtv=Sage Art: Giant Rasengan}}. As with the original, Naruto uses a shadow clone to help him form the ball. With this senjutsu version, however, he can have a shadow clone form a Big Ball Rasengan in each of his hands, which he can then pass to the clones for them to wield. The Sage Art: Big Ball Rasengan is much larger than the original, almost being as big as [[Pain]]'s [[Rinnegan Summoning|summons]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 431, page 10</ref>
{{-L}}

== Trivia ==
* [[Minato Namikaze]]'s standard Rasengan occasionally matches the size of the initial Big Ball Rasengan. In fact, he could use this technique in [[Jiraiya]]'s [[Jiraiya Shinobi Handbook: The Tale of Naruto the Hero|novel]] within [[Tsunade]]'s [[Infinite Tsukuyomi]] dream.<ref name="NS441">''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 441</ref>
** By the end of the [[Fourth Shinobi World War]], [[Naruto]]'s regular Rasengan had increased to near Big Ball Rasengan size.
* When Konohamaru used this technique in an [[Chūnin Exam on Fire! Naruto vs. Konohamaru!|OVA]], he was able to use it with one hand.
